name: Rae'sDailyFunFact
0:
”Alexa, open rae's daily fun fact”
”Alexa, ask rae's daily fun fact for a fact”
”Alexa, tell rae's daily fun fact to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rae's daily fun fact
des:
Ask for Rae's Daily Fun Fact, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Rae's Daily Fun Fact provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Rae's Daily Fun Fact" or "Alexa, open Rae's Daily Fun Fact" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
